About Me

I'm John MacFadyen and a

Hi! My name is John MacFadyen. I am a Web Developer and Designer. I have a strong passion for the work I do and it shows. With years of experience as a Web developer, I have obtained the skills and knowledge necessary to make your project a success. I firmly believe every step of the design process is vital, from discussion and collaboration to concept and execution. The most important however, is a finished project that delivers results.

My Services

  • Web Design

    Web design encompasses a number of important elements including color, layout, and overall graphical appearance. Web design consider the site's audience, function, and traffic to specific sections when deciding designs.

  • Branding

    Branding aims to establish a significant and differentiated presence in the market that attracts and retains loyal customers.

  • Social Media

    . Social media includes popular networking websites, like Facebook and Twitter; as well as bookmarking sites like Reddit. It involves blogging and forums and any aspect of an interactive presence which allows individuals the ability to engage in conversations with one another
